subject: Would like to cha.t with you
body:
Hire,
i am here sitting in the internet caffe. Found your email and
decided to write. I might be c!oming to your place in 1a4 days, 
so I decided to email you. May be we can meet? I am 25a y.o.
girl. I have a apicture if you want. No need ato reply here as 
this is not my email. Write me at vsiie@JumpPost.info
